thread.title: Guardian Capital Group Limited Announces Results of Director Elections
thread.title_full: Guardian Capital Group Limited Announces Results of Director Elections

title: Guardian Capital Group Limited Announces Results of Director Elections
text:
July 28, 2015 09:22 ET Guardian Capital Group Limited Announces Results of Director Elections 
TORONTO, OTNARIO--(Marketwired - July 28, 2015) - Guardian Capital Group Limited (the "Corporation") (TSX:GCG)(TSX:GCG.A) announced the results of the director elections held at its most recent annual meeting of shareholders. Each of the following nominees was elected as a director of the Corporation to serve until the termination of the next annual meeting of the shareholders: Name of Nominee
